summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements. The landing page displays 'Maham' as a prominent clickable element with hover states (REQ-1), the apology message is initially hidden and revealed on click (REQ-2), a pink/red color scheme with white text is implemented consistently (REQ-3), and the design features elegant typography (Playfair Display serif), smooth CSS transitions, animated hearts, and a romantic gradient background (REQ-4). All acceptance criteria are met.
